txt.en: 'You return! Thank you, friend -- it will do these greybeards well to finally smile, and you have given them reason to do so. Even if they do not admit it outright.'
DNT - Slágin can be found in the Forging Hall, within the eastern wing of Thorin's Hall.\n\nYou should ask him about his request.

A young smith from Thorin's Hall has an earnest request to make on behalf of his elderly peers.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>

DNT - 'Well met, friend! Seems like Vármir picked the right person for the job.

'Some of the greybeards wish to create gifts for their spouses. But at their age, they can no longer venture out to gather materials, and we are busy with our own tasks. Still, they remain stubborn in their pride and refuse to ask others for help. 

'Such love is a rare thing, especially among us dwarves, and I wish to see them happy. They only need silver, sapphires, and sand from the Silverdeep Mine, as well as bones from nearby wildlife. Not evil creatures, mind you; I doubt the greybeards would appreciate that.'

They only need silver, sapphires, and sand from the Silverdeep Mine, as well as bones from nearby wildlife. Not evil creatures, mind you; I doubt the greybeards would appreciate that.'
The Silverdeep Mine lies to the south-east from Thorin's Hall.\n\nYou can gather the materials from the mine and local beasts. Slágin specified that the bones should not be from evil creatures.
Slágin awaits your return in the Forging Hall of Thorin's Hall.\n\nYou should deliver the materials to him.
DNT - 'Have you gathered the materials yet?'
